name: OpenNursingCoreIG
title: Open Nursing Core FHIR Implementation Guide (ONC-IG)
description: Foundational FHIR profiles for the nursing process (ADPIE), including Safety and Equity modules. BETA RELEASE - Feedback Welcome.

resource.name: 4AT Acute Change Value Set
resource.description: Scoring for Acute Change or Fluctuating Course

resource.name: 4AT Alertness Value Set
resource.description: Scoring options for 4AT Alertness

resource.name: 4AT AMT4 Value Set
resource.description: Scoring options for AMT4 (Age, DOB, Place, Year)

resource.name: 4AT Attention Value Set
resource.description: Scoring for Months Backwards test

resource.name: 4AT Delirium Assessment
resource.description: Rapid clinical test for delirium (4AT) comprising Alertness, AMT4, Attention, and Acute Change/Fluctuating Course. A total score of 4 or more suggests possible delirium.

resource.name: Abbey Pain Scale
resource.description: Pain assessment for people with dementia or who cannot verbalise. Assesses 6 parameters: Vocalization, Facial Expression, Body Language, Behavioral Change, Physiological Change, Physical Changes. Total score determines pain severity (0-2 No pain, 3-7 Mild, 8-13 Moderate, 14+ Severe).

resource.name: ACVPU Consciousness Level
resource.description: ACVPU consciousness level assessment for NEWS2 (Alert, Confusion, Voice, Pain, Unresponsive)

resource.name: ACVPU Value Set
resource.description: ACVPU consciousness level codes

resource.name: Barthel Index
resource.description: Barthel Index for measuring independence in activities of daily living (ADL). Score 0-20=total dependency, 91-99=slight dependency, 100=independent. Total range 0-100.

resource.name: Blood Pressure
resource.description: Blood pressure observation for NEWS2 (systolic BP used for scoring)

resource.name: Body Temperature
resource.description: Body temperature observation for NEWS2

resource.name: Braden Scale Assessment
resource.description: A profile for the Braden Scale pressure ulcer risk assessment

resource.name: Bristol Stool Chart
resource.description: Assessment of stool form using the Bristol Stool Chart (Types 1-7). Gold standard for bowel function assessment.

resource.name: Clinical Frailty Scale (CFS)
resource.description: Assessment of frailty using the Rockwood Clinical Frailty Scale (1-9). Essential for older adults to determine baseline functional status.

resource.name: Clinical Frailty Scale Value Set
resource.description: Codes for Rockwood Clinical Frailty Scale (1-9)

resource.name: Fitzpatrick Skin Tone Value Set
resource.description: Value set for Fitzpatrick skin type classifications

resource.name: Fluid Balance
resource.description: Assessment of fluid intake, output, and balance. Critical for renal function, hydration status, and heart failure monitoring.

resource.name: Glasgow Coma Scale
resource.description: Glasgow Coma Scale (GCS) for assessing level of consciousness. Total score 3-15 with three required components: Eye (1-4), Verbal (1-5), Motor (1-6).

resource.name: Goal Evaluation Value Set
resource.description: Value set for evaluating patient goal outcomes

resource.name: Goal Target Measure ValueSet
resource.description: Codes used for goal target measures

resource.name: Heart Rate
resource.description: Heart rate (pulse) observation for NEWS2

resource.name: Housing Status Value Set
resource.description: Value set for patient housing status

resource.name: Inspired Oxygen
resource.description: Inspired oxygen observation for NEWS2 (air vs supplemental oxygen)

resource.name: Inspired Oxygen Value Set
resource.description: Codes for inspired oxygen status

resource.name: Intervention Goal Reference
resource.description: Extension to link nursing interventions to the patient goals they are intended to achieve.

resource.name: Mental Capacity Assessment
resource.description: Records the outcome of a Mental Capacity Assessment for a specific decision. Fundamental legal safeguard in UK nursing practice.

resource.name: Mental Capacity Finding Value Set
resource.description: Codes indicating presence or absence of capacity

resource.name: Mini Mental State Examination (MMSE)
resource.description: Mini Mental State Examination for cognitive function screening. Score 24-30=no impairment, 18-23=mild, 0-17=severe. Total range 0-30.

resource.name: Monk Skin Tone Observation
resource.description: Observation of patient skin tone using the Monk Skin Tone Scale (10-point scale A-J). Provides more granular skin tone assessment than Fitzpatrick scale, particularly for darker skin tones. Supports equitable care and accurate clinical assessment across diverse populations.

resource.name: Morse Fall Scale
resource.description: Morse Fall Scale for assessing fall risk. Score 0-24=no risk, 25-50=low risk, ≥51=high risk. Total range 0-125.

resource.name: MUST Score (Malnutrition Universal Screening Tool)
resource.description: Malnutrition Universal Screening Tool for identifying adults at risk of malnutrition. Score 0=low risk, 1=medium risk, 2+=high risk. NHS-standard nutritional screening.

resource.name: NEWS2 Code Value Set
resource.description: LOINC and SNOMED codes for NEWS2

resource.name: NEWS2 Score
resource.description: National Early Warning Score 2 (NEWS2) for detecting clinical deterioration. Fully aligned with NHS CareConnect-NEWS2-Observation-1.

resource.name: NEWS2 Sub-Score
resource.description: Individual parameter sub-score for NEWS2 (0-3 for most parameters). References the related vital sign observation.

resource.name: NEWS2 Sub-Score Codes
resource.description: SNOMED codes for NEWS2 sub-scores

resource.name: Nursing Intervention Value Set
resource.description: Value set for nursing interventions

resource.name: Nursing Problem
resource.description: Nursing diagnosis or problem identified during assessment. Represents clinical judgments about individual, family, or community responses to actual or potential health problems. Part of the ADPIE framework's Diagnosis phase.

resource.name: Nursing Problem Value Set
resource.description: Value set for nursing problems and diagnoses

resource.name: Nursing Prognosis ValueSet
resource.description: Prognosis codes for clinical impression

resource.name: Observation Goal Reference
resource.description: Extension to link goal evaluation observations to the patient goals being evaluated.

resource.name: ONC Goal Evaluation
resource.description: Explicit evaluation of whether a nursing goal was achieved, closing the ADPIE loop.

resource.name: ONC NEWS2 Auto-Calculation Logic
resource.description: Logic library for calculating National Early Warning Score 2 (NEWS2) from FHIR Observations.

resource.name: ONC NHS Patient
resource.description: A patient profile for use in NHS nursing contexts with ethnic category extension.

resource.name: ONC Nursing Clinical Impression
resource.description: Nurse's synthesis of patient progress against care plan, aggregating multiple goal evaluations.

resource.name: ONC Nursing Goal
resource.description: Patient-centered goal with mandatory evaluation requirements. Serves as the 'spine' of the CarePlan, linking problems to outcomes.

resource.name: ONC Nursing Intervention
resource.description: Nursing intervention performed to achieve patient goals. Part of ADPIE Implementation phase.

resource.name: ONC Observation Codes
resource.description: Custom observation codes for Open Nursing Core

resource.name: Open Nursing Core Assessment
resource.description: Base profile for nursing assessment observations conforming to UK Core standards. Captures structured nursing assessment data as part of the ADPIE (Assessment, Diagnosis, Planning, Implementation, Evaluation) nursing process framework. Used as parent for specialized assessments like NEWS2, Braden Scale, and clinical observations.

resource.name: Oral Health Assessment
resource.description: Assessment of oral cavity health. Critical for prevention of pneumonia in frail elderly and maintaining nutrition/hydration.

resource.name: Oxygen Saturation
resource.description: Oxygen saturation (SpO2) observation for NEWS2

resource.name: Pain Assessment (NRS 0-10)
resource.description: Pain severity assessment using the Numeric Rating Scale (0-10)

resource.name: Pain Assessment Code Value Set
resource.description: LOINC codes for pain severity assessment

resource.name: Patient Story
resource.description: A narrative summary of the patient's background, biography, preferences, and personhood. Goes beyond clinical history to capture 'who the person is'.

resource.name: PBS ABC Chart
resource.description: Antecedent-Behaviour-Consequence (ABC) Chart for recording behaviours of concern. Fundamental tool in Positive Behaviour Support (PBS) for Learning Disabilities.

resource.name: PBS Behaviour Function ValueSet
resource.description: Common functions of behaviour (SEAT)

resource.name: Problem Category Value Set
resource.description: Value set for categorizing nursing problems

resource.name: Problem Type CodeSystem
resource.description: Code system for categorizing types of nursing problems

resource.name: qSOFA (Quick SOFA)
resource.description: Quick Sequential Organ Failure Assessment for sepsis screening. Score ≥2 indicates high risk. Total range 0-3.

resource.name: Reasonable Adjustment
resource.description: Captures specific strict requirements for care adjustments under the Equality Act (e.g., 'Needs BSL Interpreter', 'Cannot use stairs', 'Requires large print').

resource.name: Relational Engagement Score
resource.description: Assessment of the quality and depth of the nurse-patient relationship or engagement level. Supports the relational aspect of care.

resource.name: Respiration Rate
resource.description: Respiration rate observation for NEWS2

resource.name: Seizure Record
resource.description: Record of a specific seizure event, including type, duration, triggers, and recovery phases. Essential for epilepsy management and identifying patterns.

resource.name: Skin Tone Observation
resource.description: Observation of patient skin tone using the Fitzpatrick skin type classification. Supports equitable care by enabling skin tone-aware clinical decision making, particularly for conditions that present differently across skin tones (e.g., pressure ulcers, cyanosis).

resource.name: Sleep Pattern
resource.description: Observation of sleep quality, duration, and disturbances. Sleep pattern disturbance is a key indicator for delirium and general wellbeing.

resource.name: UK Core Ethnic Category
resource.description: An extension to record the ethnic category of a patient, as per UK Core standards.

resource.name: Urinalysis
resource.description: Point-of-care urine dipstick test results. Used to screen for urinary tract infection (UTI), diabetes (glucose/ketones), and kidney health.

resource.name: Waterlow Score
resource.description: Waterlow Pressure Ulcer Risk Assessment - NHS standard tool. Score ≥10 indicates at risk, ≥15 high risk, ≥20 very high risk.

resource.name: What Matters to Me
resource.description: Captures the patient's specific, personal priorities and non-clinical goals (e.g., 'I want to walk my daughter down the aisle'). Fundamental to person-centred care.

resource.name: Wound Assessment
resource.description: Comprehensive wound assessment including staging and dimensions
